alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 01 at 3:01AM PDT until November 01 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Overnight low temperatures dropping to between 32 and 35 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast and Santa Ynez Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
